comments:
There is a new option in WID called "Import Server Log..."



When using this, there does not seem to be WebSphere Process Server option, so I use WebSphere Application Server systemout.log option and then point to the WPS SystemOut.log file.

I get the errors below.  Would Valentina know what is causing this and what needs to be done so that I can use this new import option on WPS logs.  BTW, the logs do exist in the location below.

!ENTRY org.eclipse.tptp.monitoring.logui 4 0 2007-09-14 23:36:52.156
!MESSAGE An error occurred while attempting to import the log file D:\wid61\pf\wps\logs\server1\SystemOut.log;.
!STACK 0
org.eclipse.hyades.logging.parsers.LogParserException: IWAT0075E The log parser's initialization parameters are not set properly.
IWAT0243E The log file D:\wid61\pf\wps\logs\server1\SystemOut.log; does not exist.
	at org.eclipse.hyades.logging.parsers.importer.ParserWrapper.parse(Unknown Source)
	at org.eclipse.hyades.logging.parsers.internal.importer.LocalLogImportLoader.startParsing(Unknown Source)
	at org.eclipse.tptp.monitoring.logui.internal.wizards.ImportLogWizard$LocalLogImportJob.runOnLocalHost(Unknown Source)
	at org.eclipse.tptp.monitoring.logui.internal.wizards.ImportLogWizard$LocalLogImportJob.run(Unknown Source)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Unknown Source)
Embedded exception follows:
org.eclipse.hyades.logging.adapter.AdapterException: IWAT0075E The log parser's initialization parameters are not set properly.
IWAT0243E The log file D:\wid61\pf\wps\logs\server1\SystemOut.log; does not exist.
	at org.eclipse.hyades.logging.adapter.internal.util.Controller.prepareAdapter(Unknown Source)
	at org.eclipse.hyades.logging.adapter.Adapter.start(Unknown Source)
	at org.eclipse.hyades.logging.parsers.importer.ParserWrapper.parse(Unknown Source)
	at org.eclipse.hyades.logging.parsers.internal.importer.LocalLogImportLoader.startParsing(Unknown Source)
	at org.eclipse.tptp.monitoring.logui.internal.wizards.ImportLogWizard$LocalLogImportJob.runOnLocalHost(Unknown Source)
	at org.eclipse.tptp.monitoring.logui.internal.wizards.ImportLogWizard$LocalLogImportJob.run(Unknown Source)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Unknown Source)
!SUBENTRY 1 org.eclipse.tptp.monitoring.logui 4 0 2007-09-14 23:36:52.156
!MESSAGE
Marking this as major, user can workaround the problem now with the 'File>Import>Log' alternative.
